name: Don't lose your marbles
description:
You are... mid-air somehow? Marbles are falling onto this tray you have, apparently. Try to catch and keep as many of them as you can!

Use the mouse cursor to gravitate the marbles back towards the center of the tray.
Careful though, it can cause more harm than good depending on how you use it!

Game made for Ludum Dare 40 with the theme of
"The more you have, the worse it is"

Enjoy!

Linux & Mac versions are largely untested, sorry!
